You were probably picked up for saying kys (though in context you are clearly just quoting your teammate, Riot has a zero tolerance policy for that sort of language so false positives like this happen from time to time). The rest of your chat log isn't exactly great, but you probably have a case to get a reduction (would most likely get dropped back to a 14 day ban if they agree) since what triggered the immediate suspension was essentially a false positive. 

Submit a ticket to player support detailing the situation and they should be able to help you further, if you have any further queries or have any trouble with support let me know :)
